data.title: 36 Facts About Robert Redford
data.meta_description: Dive deep into the fascinating life of the legendary actor and environmental activist, Robert Redford, with these 36 intriguing facts. Discover the untold stories and surprising aspects of his career and personal journey.
data.text:
Robert Redford was born on August 18, 1936.

Robert Redford, a legendary American actor, director, and producer, was born on August 18, 1936, in Santa Monica, California.

He founded the Sundance Film Festival.

He has won multiple Academy Awards.
